entries.title: AMD RDNA 3 appears primed for 3D V-cache integration
entries.description: AMD's performance-boosting 3D V-cache tech might show up on an AMD RDNA 3 graphics card soon

entries.title: New Galaxy S23 leak gives us one last glimpse before Galaxy Unpacked
entries.description: A Twitter thread reveals the S23 Ultra is more square than the S22 and confirms previously known hardware capabilities.

entries.title: 1Password is bringing some major updates to its password manager
entries.description: Greater flexibility, improvements and security are all promised by 1Password in its sweep of new updates.

entries.title: New MacBook Pro 14-inch SSD is slower than the 2021 MacBook Pro and that's good
entries.description: Apple's new MacBook Pro 14-inch is already a hot item, but users might be in for some disappointment if they were hoping for a speedy SSD. Here's why they shouldn't worry about it.

entries.title: QNAP urges customers to update now to stay safe from dangerous security flaw
entries.description: QNAP NAS customers have been issued another security patch to protect them against cyberattacks.

entries.title: Samsung Galaxy S23 live blog: last-minute news and rumors ahead of Unpacked 2023
entries.description: A play-by-play of Samsung's February 1 Unpacked as it happens. We expect the Galaxy S23 series and new Galaxy Book laptops.

entries.title: Top password manager denies its entire database can be stolen
entries.description: Reports claimed KeePass users could see their vaults stolen with ease.

entries.title: NordVPN reveals the most dangerous sites for users' privacy and security
entries.description: According to the VPN firm, porn, streaming and video hosting sites have the most cyber threats. Here is all you need to know!

entries.title: Nothing Phone (2) to launch in 2023 with much-needed software upgrades
entries.description: Following the success of the Nothing Phone (1), the brand has plans to launch a "more premium" Nothing Phone (2).

entries.title: Yandex caught scraping Google SEO code
entries.description: Yandex has very little to do with Google in practice, but SEO wizards could still learn something about their craft from the recent leak of the search engine's codebase.

entries.title: Porsche NFTs aren’t in production anymore, so don’t mint one
entries.description: Porsche NFTs were a disaster, and phishing scams are now filling the void.

entries.title: Marshall's new tough Bluetooth speaker promises big sound from a small box
entries.description: More speakers and controls than you expect for the size

entries.title: Chromebooks are getting a big upgrade to take on Windows 11 laptops
entries.description: Google will facilitate Microsoft 365 integration into ChromeOS later this year, making managing your different files seamless.

entries.title: It looks like Microsoft, Nintendo, and Sony will skip E3 2023
entries.description: The games industry’s big trifecta is giving E3 a miss on the year of its in-person comeback.

entries.title: Low PSVR 2 preorders confirm that Sony is out of touch
entries.description: Sony has reportedly scaled back PSVR 2 production after poor pre-order performance. And I'm not surprised.

entries.title: The first Metaverse plugin for WordPress developers has landed
entries.description: New Croquet plugin deploys multi-user, 3D Metaverse worlds in any WordPress site.

entries.title: Why getting a new password manager could be the best security decision you make this year
entries.description: A password manager such as Dashlane can be a vital ally in keeping your business safe.

entries.title: This new Chromebook hack could let you sideload your work laptop
entries.description: Tech-savvy Chromebook users may be able to use a tool designed for repairers to unlock their work or school laptop.

entries.title: Meta's 2FA security protections could have been switched off with ease
entries.description: Bug allowed 2FA to be removed simply by knowing the phone number linked to a victim’s Facebook account.

entries.title: Microsoft Defender is getting much better at protecting Linux endpoints
entries.description: Microsoft allows Linux users to isolate their machines using Defender for Endpoint.

entries.title: Windows 11 could soon make it easier to fix problems with your PC
entries.description: This might be a real boon for those encountering difficult-to-troubleshoot errors with Windows 11.

entries.title: First Xbox Series X and Xbox Series S price hikes revealed
entries.description: The recommended retail price of both the Xbox Series X and the Xbox Series S is set to rise in Japan.

entries.title: Hacking groups are going all-out to hire new workers
entries.description: Rise in cybercriminal activity over the pandemic has led to heavy recruitment.

entries.title: The Galaxy S23's bespoke Snapdragon chip could help it rival the latest iPhones
entries.description: New rumors suggest that Samsung's Galaxy S23 phones could boast a bespoke Snapdragon chipset.

entries.title: James Gunn's DCU movie lineup will be revealed today – here's what to expect
entries.description: The DC Extended Universe's rebooted slate will be announced shortly – here's what we know so far.

entries.title: Windows 11 updates are still failing to install with mysterious error messages
entries.description: This is one long-running glitch that Microsoft really needs to sort out, and quickly.

entries.title: Your Gmail is permanently changing soon - here's what to expect
